						Map 
DESCRIPTION
This section will guide you to:
• Create a Java project in your IDE
• Write a program in Java to create maps


	package mapproject;
	import java.util.*;
	public class mapProgram 
	{
		public static void main(String[] args) 
		{
			// TODO Auto-generated method stub
			System.out.println("Hashmap");
			HashMap<Integer,String> val = new HashMap<Integer,String>();
			val.put(23, "Balu");
			val.put(22, "Maha");
			System.out.println("Elements in HashMap are: ");
			for(Map.Entry m:val.entrySet()) 
			{
				System.out.println(m.getKey()+ " " + m.getValue());
			}
			System.out.println("HashTable");
			Hashtable<Integer,String> hm = new Hashtable<Integer,String>();
			hm.put(22, "Ajit");
			hm.put(24, "Kajol");
			hm.put(25, "sharukh");
			for(Map.Entry n:hm.entrySet()) 
			{
				System.out.println(n.getKey()+ " " + n.getValue());
			}
		}
	}
	
	
OUTPUT

Hashmap
Elements in HashMap are: 
22 Maha
23 Balu
HashTable
25 sharukh
24 Kajol
22 Ajit
